description: An island in the East Blue shaped like a battleship. Beneath it lies Dragon's Nest, a secret location where the ancient Sennenryu dragons gather every 1000 years to give birth and die.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Decide to Escape with Ryu
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat crew makes the decision to help Apis and Ryu escape from Warship Island before the dragon dies, despite being surrounded by Marines.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the main conflict of the episode and the crew's escape plan.

keyEvents.title: Eric Attacks the Straw Hats
keyEvents.description: Eric launches his attack on the Straw Hat Pirates on Warship Island, using his Kama Kama no Mi powers.
keyEvents.significance: First major confrontation between Eric and Luffy in this episode.

keyEvents.title: Marines Surround the Island
keyEvents.description: Marine ships under Nelson Royal's command surround Warship Island, creating a blockade to prevent escape.
keyEvents.significance: Raises the stakes and tension for the Straw Hats' escape plan.

keyEvents.title: Nami and Apis Load Ryu
keyEvents.description: Nami and Apis work to load the weakened dragon Ryu onto a cart on Warship Island.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the physical challenge of moving Ryu and the crew's dedication.

statusHistory.reason: Location is active throughout the Warship Island Arc

name.japanese: ゴーイング・メリー号

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' first ship, a caravel gifted to them by Kaya. The ship becomes a beloved member of the crew.

keyEvents.title: Zoro and Usopp Position the Going Merry
keyEvents.description: Zoro and Usopp work together to maneuver the Going Merry into position for a quick escape from Warship Island.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the crew's teamwork in preparing for their escape with Ryu.

keyEvents.title: The Escape Begins
keyEvents.description: With Ryu secured and the Going Merry ready, the Straw Hats begin their daring escape from Warship Island.
keyEvents.significance: The ship serves as the vessel for the crew's escape through the Marine blockade.

statusHistory.reason: The Going Merry serves as the Straw Hats' ship
